headline: ICARO Media Group Enters New Multiyear Digital Network Deal with Elevator Giant Otis in Spain, Portugal and Africa
summary: DOOH Partnership to Reach Over 2.4 Million Daily Viewers via In-Elevator ScreensNEW YORK, Nov. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ICARO Media Group, Inc. (ICARO), a leading AI media technology company, continues expanding its Multiscreen Monetization Network with its recent acquisition of European Digital Out-of-Home (DOOH) firm Liftmedia. With the acquisition comes a multiyear contract with Otis Mobility S.A., a division of Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: OTIS), the world’s leading elevator company
